text: What About Bob? is a 1991 American black comedy movie directed by Frank Oz and stars Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty, Charlie Korsmo, Susan Willis and Tom Aldredge. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures and was a box office success. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Oz Category:Movies about psychiatry Category:Movies about narcissism Category:Movies about vacationing Category:Movies set in New Hampshire Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Disney movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families
title: What About Bob?
